p: The qualitative phytochemical screening of the crude methanol and chloroform leave extracts of R. albersii revealed the presence of all the tested phytoconstituents except saponins [ Table 1]. However, only alkaloids and phenols were detected in the acetone extract. Similarly, the methanol extract of C. amplifolium comprised all of the tested constituents except terpenoids, while its chloroform extract contained flavonoids, tannins, phenols and terpenoids and the acetone extract comprised flavonoids, tannins and saponins.
